duties_responsibilities.duty: Visit Construction Sites and Document Progress and Readiness for Interior Casework Installation.
Educate and coordinate with general contractors and owners on how to be ready for an efficient casework installation.
Coordinate access, storage, readiness, schedule, phasing, hoisting, jobsite rules, etc.
Perform Quality Control Inspections of Casework Installation.
Coordinate with Project Management, contract and schedule installation subcontractors.
Enforce safety policies and jobsite cleanup.
Evaluate schedule progress and ensure adequate manpower.
Develop punchlists and ensure proper and timely completion of installations.
Install miscellaneous items that may arrive following mobilization.
Update Project Managers on the status of projects.
Responsible for completing each project on time, within budget and most importantly - satisfying our customer.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or Construction Management (Master's preferred)
